string.text:
The G33 Magnifier is the selected magnifier of USSOCOM, and is compact and lightweight. The mount provides fast transitioning from 3X to 1X, and the optic offers tool-free vertical and horizontal adjustments, larger field-of-view and an adjustable diopter for improved, precise focusing. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]1.0x - 3.0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

The Razor AMG UH-1 is fast, intuitive and technologically advanced for close- quarters and lightning-fast engagement. A revolutionary type of holographic system gives you the impressive sight picture and distortion-free image of a holographic sight, with the energy efficiency and durability of a traditional red dot. With an ultra-clean sight picture and the incredibly fast EBR-CQB reticle, the UH-1 is sure to uncover a level of speed and accuracy in close-quarters you never knew existed. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]none 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

"Tough" doesn't begin to describe the Leupold Mark 4 HAMR, a scope that is as devastatingly effective as ruggedly constructed. Compact and combat-ready, the HAMR (High Accuracy Multi-Range Riflescope) is designed for precise mid-range distance marksmanship and fast target acquisition in bright daylight, low light, and at night. The HAMR will give you the upper hand in any Close Quarter and Mid-Range tactical scenario. The HAMR comes coupled with a 7.5 MOA DeltaPoint red dot sight for immediate target acquisition when needed. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]none 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

SIG Bravo4 4x30 - delivers an industry leading 42% wider field of view than current battle sights. The notably flat, distortion-free image boasts an unprecedented edge-to-edge clarity by means of a combination of Low Dispersion glass and aspherical lens design. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]fixed 4.0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

Magnifications from 3x to 9x, green/red illumination with 5 brightness settings, both for the scope and electronic unlimited brightness control for the dot sight. Red-green dot reflex sight with unlimited eye coverage and wide field of view. 
 The Picatinny mount easily mounts to any 22mm rail; Multi-coated optics with O-ring sealing and nitrogen filling ensure 100% water and fog proof. Unmatched light transmission, uncompromising mechanical performance and clarity - exactly what you need in the Zone. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]3.0x - 9.0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Pre-installed: a range finder scope, a green laser sight and a red and green dot sight %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

An open field of view keeps the peripheral vision free of knobs, dials, or the scope housing, which can mask targets. The LCO's crisp 1-MOA dot stands out in blinding sun or heavy rain, and quickly adjust between its 16 brightness settings to match any condition. The LCO is waterproof to 66 feet and can take a beating thanks to its aircraft-grade aluminum housing. 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]none 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

The D-EVO's unique design allows for a quick move between a 1x red dot sight and the 6x magnification D-EVO by simply shifting the eye line – not the head. This enables to quickly move between close-quarter shots and mid-range shots with speed and accuracy. 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]6.0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Pre-installed: a 1x red dot sight %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good

The AR-332 is designed and rugged for harsh environments and changing weather conditions. The Ballistic CQ reticle features holdover dots good out to 600 yards. They work best with 5.56 or 7.62 ammunition. Picatinny rails allow piggybacking of additional sights, lasers or lights. The perfect AR Scope for quick target acquistion, coupled with a bit more range. 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]3.0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Pre-installed: a 1x red dot sight %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]excellent
